16587.「ジェニャどの！\n 支度は…… 済んだようですな。: Jenya! I guess you're all packed.

16588.「我ら 王宮パラディンと <pc>が\n ジェニャどのを 大地の竜バウギアのもと:
We, the palace paladins and <pc>,
will escort Jenya to Earthwyrm Baugia.

16589.「ジェニャさま……。\n 私…… やっぱり 納得できませんっ……。: Jenya... I... I still can't accept it...

16590.「まだ こんなに 小さいのに……\n ジェニャさまが…… いけにえだなんてっ……:
I can't believe that Jenya is still so
small... and that she's a sacrifice... Ugh...

16591.「泣かんといて ピチョン。\n それより わがまま聞いてくれて ありがとう。\n:
Don't cry, Pichon. Thanks for being so
selfish. Thanks for letting me play with
Marii.

16592.「あたしの代わりに……\n これからも いっぱい マリーちゃんと\n 遊んであげ:
I hope you will play with Marii a lot from now
on, instead of me.

16593.「はい…… はいっ……！\n もちろんです ジェニャさまっ……。\n うっ うっ: Yes... yes...! Of course, Jenya... ugh...

16594.「ズーボーはんは…… おらんのか。\n 最後まで 一緒に\n いてもらいたかった:
Zubo-san... is not here? I wanted him to stay
with us until the end, but I guess it can't be
helped.

16595.「ほな 行こか！\n さっさと 終わらそ！: Come on, let's go! Let's get this over with!

16599.「大地の竜が眠る場所へ行くには 強い魔物たちが\n 生息する地を 越えねばならん:
To reach the place where the dragons of the
earth sleep, we must cross a land inhabited by
strong monsters.

16600.「ジェニャどのも ズーボーが同行することを\n 望んでいらっしゃる。\n お前も:
Jenya wants Zubo to accompany her. Will you
join our convoy?

16602.「ありがとうな ズーボーはん！\n ズーボーはんが 一緒なら 心強いわ。:
Thank you, Mr. Zubo! It's good to have you
with us, Zubo.

16603.「では ズーボーは\n そこにいる 王宮パラディンたち ２名と\n ジェニャどの:
Then Zubo, you are to escort the two palace
paladins there and Jenya to their duty!

16604.「<pc>には 遭遇した魔物を\n 討伐しながら先行し 竜のねぐらで\n 大地の:
I order to go ahead while defeating the monsters he encounters, and to awaken the dragon of the earth at the Dragon's
Lair!

16605.「<pc>。お前に 大地の竜を\n 目覚めさせるための踊りを 伝授する！\n 一:
<pc>. I give you the dance to awaken
the dragons of the earth! You will only dance
it once, so learn it well!

16608.「今の踊りには 太古のチカラが秘められている。\n みだりに踊ることを禁じられた:
The power of the ancients is hidden in the
dances of today. It is a sacred dance that is
forbidden to be danced without permission.

16609.「これから向かう バウガの風穴の奥……\n 竜のねぐらで踊れば 踊りのチカラに反:
If you dance at the Dragon's Lair, deep within Baoga Windhole, you will awaken the Earthwyrm Baugia, who will respond to the power of your
dance.

16610.「さあ 出発だ！ くれぐれも 油断するなよ！\n ジェニャどのを 大地の竜バウギ:
Let's go! Be on your guard! We must defend
Jenya to the Earthwyrm Baugia!

16611.「<pc>。先行役の務めを\n しっかりと 果たしてくれたようだな。\n おかげ:
<pc>. I see you've done your job
well. Thanks to you, I've made it this far
with ease.

16612.「ここが…… 数千年も前から\n 何人もの少女たちを 大地の竜バウギアに\n 捧:
So this is the place... where thousands of
girls have been sacrificed to the Earthwyrm
for thousands of years.

16614.「<pc>。\n 大地の竜を 目覚めさせる儀式を 始めてくれ！\n ここで ふし:
<pc>. Begin the ritual to awaken the
dragons of the earth! Here, dance the dance of
wonder!

16615.「お前が 踊り終わるまで\n オレたちは 下がっていよう。\n では 頼んだぞ！:
We'll stay back until you're done dancing. Now
then, please!

16617.「どうやら 大地の竜が 目覚めたようだ。\n あとは ジェニャどのを捧げれば 大:
It seems that the dragon of the earth has awakened. All that remains is to offer Jenya, and the dragon will sleep again, and the
continent will be saved.

16618.「……それにしても\n ジェニャどのの一行は まだか。\n ずいぶん 時間が か:
But Jenya's group hasn't arrived yet. It's
taking a long time.

16619.「も…もしかして…… ズーボーのヤツが\n ジェニャを 逃がしてやったんじゃ……: Could it be... that Zubo let Jenya go...?

16620.「…………外へ 様子を見にいこう。\n <pc>も 来い。:
Let's go outside and take a look. Come on,
<pc>.

16621.「遅くなりまして 申し訳ありません！\n 潜んでいた魔物に襲われて…… ジェニャ:
Sorry for the delay! The monster that was
lurking in the woods attacked... and Zubo, who
was covering for Jenya... was injured...

16622.「ズーボーはん…… あたしのために ごめんな。\n ……そのキズ 痛いよな？:
Mr. Zubo I'm sorry for what I did to you. That
cut hurts, doesn't it?

16624.「ここで…… いけにえになることが\n ジェニャの願いなら……\n オイラは そ:
If it is Jenya's wish to be sacrificed here, I
will make it come true.

16627.「お別れの時が 来たみたいやな。\n みんなのおかげで ちゃんと\n 自分の役割:
I guess it's time to say goodbye. Thanks to
all of you, I'll be able to do my part. Thank
you!

16628.「まあ…… マリーちゃんの赤ちゃんが\n 見られへんのは残念やけど ガートラント:
Well... it's too bad we won't get to see baby
Marii, but we've had a lot of fun since we
came to Gartlant.

16629.「あたしは 生まれてから今日まで\n ここで死ぬために 生きてきてん。\n だか:
I've lived to die here from the moment I was
born until today. So... I'm prepared.

16630.「ほんまに ありがとう！\n みんな あたしの分まで いっぱい生きてな！:
Thank you so much! I hope you all live as long
as I do!

16633.「あたしの命ひとつで……\n みんなが 助かるんやもん。\n ………めっちゃ お:
With just my life... everyone will be saved.
It's a great deal, isn't it?

16634.「これで ええんや……。\n これで ええんやけど…………: This is fine... this is fine...

16640.「バカな…… 無謀だ！\n 大地の竜は 魔神に等しき存在……\n パラディンガー:
That's absurd! The dragons of the earth are as
much demons as Knight Watch, and there's no
way we can stop them!

16641.「ズーボーはん やめて！\n あたしのことは ええから 下がって！！:
Mr. Zubo, stop! Don't worry about me. Just get
back!

16642.「やっと ジェニャは 本当のことを言ったのだ！: Finally, Jenya was telling the truth!

16643.「生きたいヤツが 死んではいけないのだ！\n オイラが盾になって ジェニャの未来:
He who wants to live must not die! I will
shield Jenya's Future!

16644.「<cs_pchero>！\n チカラを 貸してほしいのだ！！\n ジェニャに:
<cs_pchero>! I need your help! I want you to
give Jenya's Future!

16646.「ズーボーはん…… もう やめて！\n あたしのことは ええから 下がって！！:
Mr. Zubo... stop it! I don't care what you do
to me, just get back!

16647.「オ…オイラが盾になって\n ジェニャの……未来を守る…のだ！！:
I will be your shield to protect Jenya's
Future!

16648.「<cs_pchero>！\n チカラを 貸してほしいのだ！！\n ジェニャに:
<cs_pchero>! I need your help! I want you to
give Jenya's Future!

16651.「大地の竜が…… 退いた………？: The dragon of the earth... has retreated...?

16652.「そ…そんなことが 可能だなんて……！\n すごい……！: I didn't know that was possible! Amazing...!

16653.「……やりやがった！\n ホントに すげえヤツらだぜ！！: They did it! They really did it!

16656.「ズーボーはん！ なんで……？\n なんで ズーボーはんが 石になんの……！？:
Mr. Zubo! Why...? Why did Mr. Zubo turn to
stone?

16657.「あの石は…… 博愛の碑と 同じ形………？:
That stone... is it the same shape as the Love
Statues?

16658.「……博愛の碑は 大切なものを守る\n パラディンの姿と 伝えられていたが……:
...Love Statues, which was supposed to be a
figure of a paladin protecting what was dear
to him...

16659.「ただ その姿を かたどっただけのものだと\n 思っていた。まさか 本当に 石に:
I thought it was just a mere replica of that
figure. I had no idea it was really a paladin
turned to stone...

16660.「では あれが…… パラディンの信念を\n 貫きとおした者の 最期の姿……！？:
So, that was the last image of a man who had
followed through on his beliefs as a paladin?

16661.「全員！ ズーボーに 黙とう！！: All of you! Silence for Zubo!

16664.「マリーちゃん 待ってぇな！\n 赤ちゃん産んだばかりやのに 元気すぎやわ！:
Marii, wait for me! You just had a baby.
You're too healthy!

16666.「ありがとうな……。\n 大地の竜から 助けてもらった お礼\n まだ 言うてな:
Thank you... I haven't thanked you yet for
saving me from the dragon of the earth.

16667.「ズーボーはんのこと 思いだしたら\n 泣いてしまいそうになんねんけど……。: I almost cry when I think of Zubo...

16668.「あたしが 生きていられんのは\n ズーボーはんが 命を くれたからやもんな。\:
The only reason I am still alive is because
Zubo gave me his life. I have to live for
Zubo.

16669.「大地の竜は また眠りについたから\n お金は 返さんでええって\n グロスナー:
King Grossner said that since the dragon of
the earth has gone to sleep again, we don't
have to return the money...

16670.「<pc>はん。パラディンって すごいな？\n ……あたしの命だけやなくて あた:
<pc>Han. Isn't it amazing to be a
paladin? ...Not only did he save my life, he
saved the lives of everyone in my village.

16671.「あたし 大きくなったら ズーボーはんみたいな\n パラディンになって 困ってる:
When I grow up, I'm going to become a paladin
like Zubo and help those in need. What do you
think? It's a good idea, isn't it?

16672.「<pc>はんも ありがとうな！\n あたしは もうすこししたら 集落に帰るけど:
Thanks again, <pc>! I'll be heading
back to the village in a little while, but
I'll see you guys again sometime!

46575.<center>ジェニャの泣き声は いつまでも響いた……。:
Jenya's cries echoed through the air
forever...

46576.<center>団長を始め 王宮パラディンたちは 敬意を込め\n石となったズーボ:
The paladins of the royal court, including the commander, hoisted Zubo, who had turned to stone, high in respect, and left the Dragon's
Lair with Jenya.
